section.section:
This subsection does not apply to a candidate for:
President or Vice President of the United States; or
any federal office who seeks nomination by petition.

Unless the individual is a registered voter affiliated with the political party, an individual may not be a candidate for:
an office of that political party; or
except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, nomination by that political party.

text.section:
The requirements for party affiliation specified under subsection (a) of this section do not apply to a candidate for:
a judicial office; or
a county board of education.
